DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine objective response rate ( complete partial response ) patient receive LY573636 one prior systemic treatment unresectable metastatic melanoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Study LY573636 Treating Patients With Malignant Melanoma
DOC.detailed_description: Patients receive 2-hour intravenous infusion study drug ( LY573636 ) every 28 day . Radiological imaging scan perform first dose study drug every treatment . Patients assess clinical progression every visit response approximately every 56 day ( every cycle ) .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis malignant melanoma unresectable metastatic ( Stage III IV ) Have receive 1 previous systemic treatment regimen unresectable metastatic melanoma . An immunotherapy antibodybased regimen ( include vaccinationbased treatment ) count prior treatment regimen determine study eligibility , unless combine chemotherapeutic target anticancer drug . Have discontinue previous therapy cancer , include chemotherapy , radiotherapy , immunotherapy , investigational therapy least 30 day Serious preexist medical condition Have receive two previous treatment regimen unresectable metastatic melanoma Have second primary cancer ( unless diseasefree 2 year ) Active treatment Warfarin ( Coumadin ) Primary ocular mucosal melanoma
